TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeLibImporterNotifySink

Docs.summary: Provides a callback mechanism for the type library converter to inform the caller of the status of the conversion, and involve the caller in the conversion process itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This interface is used in the process of converting a COM type library to a managed assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ReportEvent (System.Runtime.InteropServices.ImporterEventKind eventKind, int eventCode, string eventMsg);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportEvent(valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ImporterEventKind eventKind, int32 eventCode, string eventMsg) cil managed

Docs.param: An value indicating the type of event.
Indicates extra information about the event.
A message generated by the event.
Docs.summary: Notifies the caller that an event occured during the conversion of a type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the event being reported is a warning or an error, `eventCode` will contain the HRESULT of the error. For any other event it will be 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Reflection.Assembly ResolveRef(object typeLib) cil managed

Docs.param: The object implementing the interface that needs to be resolved.
Docs.summary: Asks the user to resolve a reference to another type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If a reference to another type library is found during the conversion of a type library, the caller is asked to return the correct assembly for that type library.
